text: Marc Scott Ceccarelli (born January 4, 1968) is an American animator, director, producer, and writer. He won the 2018 British Academy Children's Awards in International Animation and the 2018 Daytime Emmy Award in Outstanding Childrenâ€™s Animated Series for his work on Nickelodeon's SpongeBob SquarePants. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American movie producers Category:American movie directors Category:Writers from Bakersfield, California Category:American television directors Category:Businesspeople from Bakersfield, California
